00281 #define NOTIFICATION_SERVICE_ALL        1       /* all types of service notifications */
00282 #define NOTIFICATION_HOST_ALL           2       /* all types of host notifications */

00532 /*************************** DATA STRUCTURES  *****************************/
00533 
00534 /* LIFO data structure */
00535 typedef struct lifo_struct{
00536         char *data;
00537         struct lifo_struct *next;
00538         }lifo;

00603 
00604 /******************************** MULTIURL PATCH *******************************/
00605 
00606 #ifndef DISABLE_MULTIURL
00607 
00608 #define MU_PATCH_ID     "+MU"
00609 
00610 int MU_lasturl, MU_thisurl;
00611 char MU_iconstr[16], *MU_origstr, *MU_ptr;
00612 
00613 /* Have process_macros() generate processed_string *BEFORE* starting the loop */
00614 
00615 #define BEGIN_MULTIURL_LOOP                                                                             \
00616         /* Init counters */     MU_lasturl=0; MU_iconstr[0]='\0';                                       \
00617         /* MAIN LOOP */         for (MU_origstr=MU_ptr=processed_string; (*MU_ptr)!='\0'; ) {           \
00618                 /* Internal init */     MU_thisurl=MU_lasturl;                                          \
00619                 /* Skip whitespace */   for (;isspace(*MU_ptr);MU_ptr++) ;                              \
00620                 /* Detect+skip ap. */   for (;(*MU_ptr)=='\'';MU_ptr++) MU_thisurl=MU_lasturl+1;        \
00621                 /* Ap. found? */        if (MU_thisurl>MU_lasturl) {                                    \
00622                         /* yes->split str */    sprintf(MU_iconstr,"%u-",MU_thisurl);                   \
00623                                                 processed_string=MU_ptr;                                \
00624                                                 for (;((*MU_ptr)!='\0')&&((*MU_ptr)!='\'');MU_ptr++) ;  \
00625                                                 if ((*MU_ptr)=='\'') { (*MU_ptr)='\0'; MU_ptr++;        \
00626                                                         for (;isspace(*MU_ptr);MU_ptr++) ; }            \
00627                                         } else {                                                        \
00628                         /* no->end loop */      MU_iconstr[0]='\0'; MU_ptr="";                          \
00629                                         }
00630 
00631 /* Do the original printf()s, additionally inserting MU_iconstr between icon path and icon (file)name */
00632 
00633 #define END_MULTIURL_LOOP                                                                               \
00634                 /* Int -> ext ctr */    MU_lasturl=MU_thisurl; processed_string=MU_ptr;                 \
00635         /* MAIN LOOP */         }                                                                       \
00636         /* Hide evidence */     processed_string=MU_origstr;
00637 
00638 /* Do the free(processed_string) *AFTER* ending the loop */
00639 
00640 #else /* ndef DISABLE_MULTIURL */
00641 
00642 #define MU_PATCH_ID     ""
00643 char *MU_iconstr="";
00644 
00645 #endif /* ndef DISABLE_MULTIURL */
00646 
00647 
00648 
00649 #ifdef __cplusplus
00650 }
00651 #endif
00652 
00653 #endif
00654
